data.text: @CTVNews Is it not possible to just be happy he survived a long battle? No fear mongering, no anti govt crap? You know....just be a kind human?

@jmremains @CTVNews Funny,  Biden and all the experts have called both upcoming winters as dark & severe flu seasons
Regardless of mask theatrics.

Where did the flu go?

It's a coronavirus.

@islanders_fan @CTVNews Here ya go. I suspect case numbers are lower because people are wearing masks and keeping their hands clean. I believe we should continue with this practice. https://t.co/yufhvn038M

@CTVNews Yup
Here's an outlier case that the fear media shoves to the front

Ever wonder how many people get severely ill from the seasonal flu?

They won't report that it is a regular occurrence

What happened to the flu this year?......last year....???
